page.title: 03LAW AND ORDER
page.content: THERE IS NO LOCAL POLICEMAN IN OUR BLOCK AND WHEN WE ASKED THE POLICE IN FLEET,THE TOWN THAT IS RESPONSIBLE FOR COVERING MOST OF OUR OUR BLOCK THEY SAID THAT THERE WAS NO REAL CRIME IN OUR AREA. THE BIGGEST CRIME WAS PEOPLE GOING TOO FAST ON THE COUNTRY LANES. SOME PEOPLE BREAK THINGS AND COMMIT VANDALISM, AND THIS CRIME IS BECOMING WORSE BUT IS STILL NOT AS BAD AS IN TOWNS.SOMETIMES THE POLICE SAY THEY HAVE TO DEAL WITH THE CRIME OF PEOPLE TAKING WALKS THROUGH FIELDS WHERE FARMERS ARE BREEDING BABY LAMBS AND SOMETIMES THEY TAKE DOGS AND DISTURB THE SHEEP. EARLIER THIS YEAR THE POLICE FOUND A LOT OF VALUABLE EQUIPMENT THAT HAD BEEN STOLEN AND THEN HIDDEN AWAY BY THE THIEVES.
